message: So yeah, please upvote the reddit post http://www.reddit.com/r/starcraft/comments/g5kaz/tired_of_all_the_good_sc2_events_being_in_texas/

wow, I <3 DT's!
hope the tournament went good!
@gunnarsipper awww I wish you could have come for a bit!  It was a great success!  in my eyes at least.
the sc2 tournament was AMAZING!  thanks to everyone who put this together!!!
@gunnarsipper Really wish you could have come out to get some free stuff! It was just fun overall to hang out, watch games and have a pants off dance off with @JunklessTrunk and @GreatBalancer :p
I saw the picture of Megan's fort.  I was instantly jealous i wasn't there.
It was amazing, mainly the awe inspired by how many people are willing to show up for a tournament of a Japanese dating sim game
